p: COVID-19 has precipitated several opportunities that could be sustained beyond the pandemic. Based on the trends discussed earlier and the adoption of such approaches to date, 5 considerations in moving forward can be proposed: (1) embedding regulatory agility and lessons learned; (2) accelerating the development process of innovative medical products; (3) address manufacturing and supply bottlenecks; (4) strengthening international cooperation, notably for clinical trials and vaccine development; and (5) committing to easing the regulatory burden and adopting the use of digital technologies.
